title: Add safe no-op backend module to unblock generator loop

requirements.text: Create a new Motoko source file in the backend (do not modify `backend/main.mo`) that is syntactically valid and contains a minimal, side-effect-free module (for example: a small `module { public let version : Text = "noop"; }`). The module must not be imported or referenced by the main actor and must not change runtime behavior or stable state.
acceptanceCriteria: A new file is added under the `backend/` directory containing a valid Motoko `module { ... }` (not an `actor`).
No changes are made to `backend/main.mo` (no new imports, no edits).
The project still builds successfully after adding the file.
There is no change to canister behavior, state, or exposed Candid interface as a result of this change.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor architecture (all canister logic stays in `backend/main.mo`).
Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing chunked upload/resumable upload backend APIs in this step.
Any changes to stable variables, storage maps, or data schemas.
